com.percussion.loader.ui
Class PSExtractorConfigContext

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.loader.ui.PSExtractorConfigContext

public class PSExtractorConfigContext
extends Object

This class is used as the repository for the edited extractor definition. It also contains various cataloger and accessor methods for the extractor editors. The catalogged information will be cached as a singleton object, so that all extractors will share the same cache. It caches only one server info at a time, the server connection info is set by setRemoteAgent(PSRemoteAgent).

Constructor Detail

PSExtractorConfigContext

public PSExtractorConfigContext()
Method Detail

getInstance

public static PSExtractorConfigContext getInstance()
Get a new object of this class. Caller is responsible to call setRemoteAgent(PSRemoteAgent) and setExtractorDef(PSExtractorDef) before call any other methods within this class.

Returns:
the new object, never null.

setRemoteAgent

public boolean setRemoteAgent(com.percussion.cms.objectstore.client.PSRemoteAgent remoteAgent)
                       throws com.percussion.loader.PSLoaderException
Constructs an instance from a remote agent. Caller is responsible to call setExtractorDef(PSExtractorDef) afterwards.

Parameters:
remoteAgent - The remote agent, which is used to communicate with the remote server. It may not be null.
Returns:
true if the supplied remote agent will be used to communicate with the remote server; false if the supplied remote agent will not be used because its connection info is the same as the existing one in this object.
Throws:
com.percussion.loader.PSLoaderException - if an error occurs while communicate with the remote server.

setExtractorDef

public boolean setExtractorDef(PSExtractorDef extractorDef)
                        throws com.percussion.loader.PSLoaderException
Set the extractor definition.

Parameters:
extractorDef - The to be set extractor definition, it may not be null or empty.
Returns:
true if it is a valid definition; false if some of the properties are invlid.
Throws:
com.percussion.loader.PSLoaderException - if an error occurs

resetExtractor

public boolean resetExtractor()
                       throws com.percussion.loader.PSLoaderException
Updates the extractor definition from its repository, re-validating the current extractor definition. This should be done after the connection information is modified for the current descriptor, which contains the extractor definition.

Returns:
true if the updated extractor definition is still valid; false otherwise.
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if validateExtractorState() failed the validating.
com.percussion.loader.PSLoaderException - if an error occurs

getContextVariable

public PSEntry getContextVariable()
Get the current context variable for the static extractor definition.

Returns:
The context variable, it may be null if it is not defined.
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if validateExtractorState() failed the validating.

setContextVariable

public void setContextVariable(PSEntry cntVariable)
Set the current context variable for the static extractor definition.

Parameters:
cntVariable - The to be set content variable, it may not be null.
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if validateExtractorState() failed the validating.

getExtractorDef

public PSExtractorDef getExtractorDef()
Get the (original) extractor definition which is from setExtractorDef(PSExtractorDef).

Returns:
The extractor definition, never null. If the definition is static type, then it is an instance of PSStaticItemExtractorDef.
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if the extractor definition has not been set yet.

getUpdatedExtractorDef

public PSExtractorDef getUpdatedExtractorDef()
Get the updated extractor definition, which may be different from the original one.

Returns:
The updated extractor definition, never null.
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if validateExtractorState() failed the validating.

validateExtractorDef

public boolean validateExtractorDef()
Validating current content of the extractor definition.

Returns:
true if the extractor definition contains enough valid information for extracting items; false otherwise.

getCommunity

public PSEntry getCommunity()
Get the current community. The called must set the extractor definition first.

Returns:
The current community, never null.
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if validateExtractorState() failed the validating.

setCommunity

public void setCommunity(PSEntry community)
Set a new community. Do nothing if it is the same with the current community; otherwise, all data (content-type, fields, workflow, ...etc) will be reset to null or empty.

Parameters:
community - The to be set community, it may not benull.
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if validateExtractorState() failed the validating.

validateExtractorState

public void validateExtractorState()
Make sure the current state of the context is valid for either item or static extractor.

Throws:
IllegalStateException - if the remote agent (for the catalogger) has not been set or the repository of the extractor definition has not been set yet.

getCommunities

public Iterator getCommunities()
                        throws com.percussion.loader.PSLoaderException
Get a list of communities from the remote server.

Returns:
An iterator over zero or more PSEntry objects, never null, but may be empty.
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if validateExtractorState() failed the validating.
com.percussion.loader.PSLoaderException - if an error occurs.

getContentType

public PSEntry getContentType()
Get the current content type that is defined by the extractor definition.

Returns:
The content type, it may be null if the content type is invalid or unknown.
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if validateExtractorState() failed the validating.

setContentType

public void setContentType(PSEntry contentType)
Set a new content type. Do nothing if the new content type is the same as the current one; otherwise, the system and non-system field lists will be set to empty.

Parameters:
contentType - The to be set content type, it may not be null.
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if validateExtractorState() failed the validating.

public Iterator getContentTypes()
                         throws com.percussion.loader.PSLoaderException

Throws:
IllegalStateException - if validateExtractorState() failed the validating.
com.percussion.loader.PSLoaderException - if an error occurs.

getDefinedFields

public Iterator getDefinedFields(boolean getSystemFields)
Get system or non-system fields which are defined in the current content type. User must first call setExtractorDef(PSExtractorDef).

Parameters:
getSystemFields - true if need to get a list of system fields of the current content type; otherwise, return a list of non-system fields.
Returns:
An iterator over zero or more PSFieldProperty.
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if validateExtractorState() failed the validating.

getAvailableFields

public Iterator getAvailableFields(PSEntry contentType,
                                   boolean getSystemFields)
Get all (system or non-system) fields for the supplied content type.

Parameters:
contentType - The specified content type, it may not be null.
getSystemFields - true if wants to get a list of system fields of the specified content type; otherwise, return a list of non-system fields.
Returns:
An iterator over zero or more PSContentField objects. It will not include the fields for community-id and workflow-id.

setDefinedFields

public void setDefinedFields(List fields,
                             boolean setSystemFields)
Set the system or non-system fields for the current item extractor.

Parameters:
fields - The to be set fields. It is a list over zero or more PSFieldProperty objects. It may not be null.
setSystemFields - true if wants to set the system fields for the current content type; otherwise, set the non-system fields.
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if validateExtractorState() failed the validating.

the workflow, it may be null if workflow is not defined or invalid.

getTransitions

public Iterator getTransitions(PSEntry workflow)
                        throws com.percussion.loader.PSLoaderException
Get a list of valid transitions for the supplied workflow

Parameters:
workflow - The workflow from where requesting the transitions, it may not be null.
Returns:
An iterator over zero or more PSEntry, never null, but may be empty. The value of each PSEntry is the trigger name of the transition.
Throws:
com.percussion.loader.PSLoaderException - if an error occurs.
